sn46.43:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you a path for crushing Māra’s army.
sn46.43:1.5: It is the seven awakening factors.
sn46.43:1.7: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
sn46.43:1.8: This is the path for crushing Māra’s army.”
